Catfight! Undine vs Pixie!
Monster Rancher Metropolis: The Cafe: Archived Topics From Prior Years: Year 2001 Topics (Year Of The Heart Crystal): Catfight! Undine vs Pixie!
By torey_luvullo on Friday, January 12, 2001 - 05:20 am:

while chatting last night with carl, the subject of "who's a better monster - undines or pixies?" came up. carl seemed kinda surprised that i thought undines were better.

since there are a lot of possible variables, let me explain my answer more fully here. i am assuming that i have raised both according to my normal pattern - they are both in stage 4, with stats something like 350/150/950/950/950/550. both have an int attack in every category [except none for pixie in close]. neither has all of their possible attacks, but pixie has at least megaray, lightning and bang, and undine has at least ice coffin, hailstorm, ice arrow and the two close in int attacks [cant remember their name right now]. i think undine wins the majority of the encounters between the two.

any other opinions out there? feel free to adjust my assumptions to fit your own experience; this is just my usual raising pattern.

By SCT on Friday, January 12, 2001 - 10:18 am:

I know that my Pixies with 999INT and Big Bang still couldn't KO a lot of the monsters in the Big 4. I don't know if Undines are different but if they don't have this disadvantage than they might be better....I highly doubt it tho!^_^

By Carl Carlisle on Friday, January 12, 2001 - 11:36 am:

You have life and power at much lower levels than the rest of the stacks. With a Kasumi pixie, I'm able to have a more balanced monster.
Were those scores for your undine or pixie? How old is it? Is it a first generation monster?
I'm going to do a comparision, myself. What kind of undine do you recommend that I use, Torey?

By torey_luvullo on Friday, January 12, 2001 - 04:54 pm:

these are scores for both. equal stats. i recommend the pure undine. both are 2d gen or higher.

i guess what im saying is that i think the undine attacks are better. i'd be interested in reading the results of a fair fight.

By Tony on Saturday, January 13, 2001 - 05:26 am:

I'd put my Undines I've raised against any of my Pixies.

By SuperGokou use to be Gokou on Sunday, January 14, 2001 - 03:58 pm:

KAO'KEN

By torey_luvullo on Sunday, January 14, 2001 - 04:18 pm:

flying is a big advantage - but its hard to fly in a hailstorm!

By Argos on Wednesday, January 17, 2001 - 05:03 pm:

I'd have to go with the Undine. Lots of hi % withering attacks,some real damaging int attacks, good speed, you can peck away all day ,then BLAM!!!!(or FOOM,if you're Madden). I wasn't all that impressed by the Siren's results, but the pure undines rock!

In all fairness, pixies are much more fun to raise,and I haven't raised em all.
